name: Skip McJangles
description:
Skip McJangles is a game developed for the 2017 Fall Game Jam at IUPUI using the theme of "dust."  It boasts about ~5 minutes of play and is the result of the combined efforts of:

  • Ben Nguyen (Programming)
  • Joey Pittman (Art/Music)
  • Tori Butcher (Art/Level Design)
  • Abby Markel (Art)
  • Michael Balkevicius (Art)
  • Virginia Hooton (Art)
